title: Child of Darkness
description: It's the eve of the second Demon War. The attack against Sicily has been rebuffed by both human forces and Arcane human Mages. But the war is just beginning. The Portal to Hell in California is open and thousands of angry little Demons are pouring out. Military forces are scrambling meet the oncoming Horde.  Agatha Blackmore and her team have been called in to help. A third front in the war threatens to open in the American South. Their mission is simple find the Demon Lord and kill him. But how does a Witch, a Vampire, some Weres, and a tiny Unicorn do that? Only Magick will tell.
author: T.S. Paul
